name: The Stadium Project
description:
The Stadium Project is a Stadium Building game that will keep you entertained for a little while. It's simple charm, graphics and gameplay will leave you smiling!

Features:

  • Growing stands.
  • Coins and income.
  • Fans that influence results and income.
  • Capacity that influences ticket prices.
  • A simple match system that doesn't get in the way.
  • Maintenance fees that affect profits.
  • Bankruptcy

System Requrements:

Windows:

  • CPU Cores: Single Core
  • Minimum RAM: 512 MB
  • DirectX Version: 9.0c
  • Graphics Card RAM: 128 MB
  • Graphics Card: 9.0c
  • Graphics Card Shader Model: Not Required
  • Sound Card: None
  • CPU Speed: 1.6 GHz
  • Operating System: Windows XP and above (32-bit executable)
